H0.text: Eating foods high in fat is recommended for humans to maintain good health.

H1.text: Exercise regularly is necessary for humans to maintain good health.

H2.text: Drink alcohol often is the recommended action for humans to maintain good health.

H3.text: Smoking tobacco occasionally is what humans should do in order to maintain good health.

A4.text: Moderate levels of exercise have been correlated with preventing aging by reducing inflammatory potential.

A5.text: The beneficial effect of exercise on the cardiovascular system is well documented.
